select a.adrNo,a.userNo,a.catNo,a.adrName,a.lat,a.lng,a.rowaddress,a.address,b.iconUrl,b.catName from board.Address a, board.Category b where a.userNo=b.userNo and a.catNo = b.catNo and a.userNo=1 and b.userNo=1
and a.adrName like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and b.catName like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
order by a.adrNo desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
select a.adrNo,a.userNo,a.adrName,a.lat,a.lng,a.rowaddress,a.address,a.memo,a.createdAt,c.catName,c.catNo from board.category c, board.address a where a.adrNo = #{adrNo} and c.catNo = #{catNo}
